ingredients: ['180ml full fat milk', '1 bay leaf', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 tablespoon whole peppercorns', '25g butter', '1/2 small onion, minced', '25g self raising flour', '2 eggs, separated', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh chives', '1 tablespoon sundried tomatoes, finely chopped', "125g goat's cheese, crumbled", 'salt and pepper, to taste']
